description:
Leader of a gang of Patriotic Knight Corps (PKC) thugs.
Attempts an attack on Frederica Greenhill when she seeks out http://anidb.net/ch773 [Admiral Bucock]`s help during the course of the inquiry chaired by http://anidb.net/ch858 [Negroponty]. His attack is foiled by http://anidb.net/ch820 [Mashengo] and by the appearance of Bucock`s staff, including http://anidb.net/ch797 [Pfeiffel].
name: Yuukoku Kishidan Danchou
